content:
# The furnace is still out of fuel and has no ingredients to smelt, which means it is unable to produce any iron plates.
# This indicates that the previous attempts to insert fuel and iron ore were not successful, or the furnace did not process them correctly.

# Since the furnace is completely out of fuel, I will need to add wood to it again to ensure it can operate.
# I will insert 2 wood into the stone furnace to provide enough fuel for smelting.

insert_item(Prototype.Wood, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=2)  # Add 2 wood to fuel the furnace.

# Now that the furnace has fuel, I will reinsert 1 iron ore for smelting.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=1)  # Insert 1 iron ore.

# I will now wait for the smelting process to complete.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum 30 seconds wait.
    current_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)
    if current_inventory.get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 1:  # Wait until we have at least 1 iron plate.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout for iron ore - please check resources.")

# After the wait, I will check the inventory and extract the iron plate if it has been produced.
extracted_iron_plate = extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, position=stone_furnace_entity.position, quantity=1)

# Finally, I will attempt to craft the assembling machine now that I should have the necessary materials.
craft_item(Prototype.AssemblingMachine1, quantity=1)

# Check the updated inventory after crafting the assembling machine.
print(f"Inventory after crafting assembling machine: {inspect_inventory()}")
